vriforecasting 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Model fitting and producing short-term forecasts using weekly data

    Reference

    All functions

    combine_df_pred_case()

    Extract combined dataframe with forecast quantiles and weekly case data for summary function

    create_forecast_df()

    Extract data-frame with forecasts for validation violin plot

    create_quantiles()

    summarise a data frame d by groups along a variable

    daily_time_period_result

    Time period result: daily forecasts of PLOVER flu data in sliding windows as the output of forecast_time_period_epiestim

    extend_rows_model_data()

    extract model data with extension during each iteration of loop

    extract_agg_samples_epiestim_fit()

    Summarise incidence values into weekly aggregate

    extract_daily_samples_epiestim_fit()

    Extract daily forecast samples

    extract_quantile_epiestim()

    Extract calculated quantiles from the weekly samples

    extract_sim_samples_epiestim()

    Extract simulated samples ideally 1000 samples per date

    fit_epiestim_model()

    fit_epiestim_model - Function to estimate the reproduction number of an epidemic from weekly data

    forecast_time_period_epiestim()

    Iterate through a time-period as a sliding window to produce short-term forecasts with the EpiEstim model fit

    get_weekly_phrdw()

    Obtain weekly phrdw data group by date & age

    get_weekly_phrdw_by_type_date_age()

    Filter weekly phrdw data filtered by disease type, date, age

    get_weekly_plover()

    Obtain the weekly cases from plover data

    get_weekly_plover_by_date_type()

    Filter the weekly plover data by date & disease type

    phrdw_data

    Daily/Weekly flu, RSV, sars_cov2 Cases from Phrdw

    plot(<forecast_time_period_epiestim>)

    Plot forecasts at each iteration with uncertainty quantile ranges

    plotValidation()

    Plot a violin plot with specific time horizon predictions against true values for validation

    plot_all_time_period_forecast_data_helper()

    Helper function to plot forecasts at each iteration with uncertainty quantile ranges

    plover_data

    Weekly Flu Cases from Plover

    pred_samples_with_quantile_helper()

    Helper function to extract dataframe with week ahead forecasts for Violin plot

    rtrunc_norm()

    Sample from a truncated normal using inverse transform uniform sampling

    summary(<forecast_time_period_epiestim>)

    Generate a summary of model validation

    time_weighted_diff()

    Extract squared error between predicted and confirmed case values weighted by number of time-points used to make prediction

    weekly_time_period_result

    Time period result: weekly forecasts of PLOVER flu data in sliding windows as the output of forecast_time_period_epiestim

    weekly_transformed_plover_data

    Weekly aggregated and transformed Flu Cases from Plover
